attributes.action: Make the group black lives matter illegal
attributes.additional_details:
This a racist group  who are only concerned with  black lives matters issues this multi cultural country and all lives matter not  just  black .
English defence league is illegal for being racist so should this group be .
attributes.background:
I want to make the group black lives matter 
Illegal .

rejection.details:
The UK government isn't responsible for banning organisations.  

You may be thinking about proscription which is a legal process that is only possible for organisations that meet the legal tests set out in the Terrorism Act 2000. The English defence league is not a proscribed organisation and therefore not illegal. 

You can find out more here: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/901434/20200717_Proscription.pdf
